race_form.race_comment: LMC LITTLE CHIPS (8) ran second last start at this track over 1609m, beaten 8 metres. Must overcome a very wide draw. Tackles a similar assignment and he can figure in the finish. ENDSWELL STATION (9) turned in a poor effort by her standards last time out when 20 metres away in eighth over 1609m at Western Fair Raceway. Form prior to that had been solid. Interesting to see what unfolds from this wide draw. Taking on a better line-up this time but she is up to the challenge. TYMAL TWISTER (5) disappointed last time when eighth over 1609m at this track. Can make amends. TORSTON (1) disappointed last time when sixth over 1609m at Mohawk Park. Can do a lot better so worth considering.

Tackles a similar assignment and he can figure in the finish. Interesting to see what unfolds from this wide draw. Taking on a better line-up this time but she is up to the challenge. TYMAL TWISTER (5) disappointed last time when eighth over 1609m at this track. Can make amends. TORSTON (1) disappointed last time when sixth over 1609m at Mohawk Park. Can do a lot better so worth considering.

race_form.race_comment: ALMIGHTY (9) has been a bit hot and cold and that continued last start when she finished third, beaten 2.5 metres, in a better performance at Wingatui over 2200m. Will need a bit of luck negotiating a very wide starting position. Her recent form is good enough to win a race of this calibre. GOLD NUGGET (4) was far from disgraced at his latest appearance over 2500m at Geraldine, beaten just 3 metres into fourth. Ideally placed and is sure to prove tough to beat. SPOTLIGHT (3) is on the radar after her last-start fifth over 2500m at Geraldine eight days ago. TESSAMAE (5) showed pleasing improvement last time out when runner-up over 2170m at Motukarara. Each-way.

SPOTLIGHT (3) is on the radar after her last-start fifth over 2500m at Geraldine eight days ago. TESSAMAE (5) showed pleasing improvement last time out when runner-up over 2170m at Motukarara. Each-way.

race_form.race_comment: SWAMP QUEEN (3) is a two-start maiden who looks close to a win after placing at both runs, the latest when second over 1308m at this track (Dirt). Drawn to enjoy a nice run just off the lead. Expecting a bold showing. GRACEFUL STAR (7) has been in the placings at her last two starts, finishing third last time when she was handy all the way over 1308m at this track (Dirt). Likely improver with strong prospects. LOLA AND ROSE (9) is yet to break through in three runs. Finished eighth at her last appearance over 1207m at Fairgrounds (Dirt) on November 22. Finds the right race and is worth consideration. DREAMCHASER JEWELS (6) was unplaced two runs back when fresh from a spell then again missed the frame last start over 1308m at this track, beaten 7 lengths into fourth. Likely improver with strong top-three prospects.

Likely improver with strong top-three prospects.

race_form.race_comment: MAXIMIANA (7) turned in a decent effort last start to finish second over 1400m at this track. Finds a suitable race and can play a major role. QUARRY GIRL (6) could only manage fifth on debut then improved last start but found one better over 1400m at this track, beaten 1.5 lengths. Looks well placed so expect another big run. SAFE WITH ME (15) returned from a spell five weeks ago when she was beaten 5 lengths into fourth over 1400m at Palermo. Perfectly placed and is sure to be there at the finish. MOON SCENERY (12) ran a better race last start at her second trip to the races, finishing fourth over 1400m at this track. Progressive type who is nearing a win.

3c6faa1d-6e38-4849-a6e3-7a329bcb1abd.race_name: The Bunyip Mixed Stake Pr1 Division1

race_form.race_comment: YUMALI (5) is better than last start when sixth (26.15) from Box 5 at Murray Bridge over 455m. Form from her last run is proving very strong. Worth another chance. ZINFANDEL EVIE (7) is a well performed dog and winner of 25 races who is worth forgiving after finishing out of the placings at Angle Park (19.93). Has a good record here at this journey. The form from her last run stacks up well. Can figure in the finish. SPLIT VISION (1) has performed well at his last couple of runs here, most recently when second beaten 1.5 lengths (23.01). Leading player again. PINK CONFETTI (4) won in the best time of the program last time out. Sure to run well again.

Leading player again. PINK CONFETTI (4) won in the best time of the program last time out. Sure to run well again.

race_form.race_comment: ONE SCARED UP HERO (7) was narrowly beaten last start when second in a small field over 796m at this track (Dirt) at the first run of the campaign. Has a decent record at this trip with four minor placings from six tries and should prove tough to beat. ONE EYE ANGEL (2) finished out of the money two starts back then was beaten 3.5 lengths when fourth over 366m at this track five-and-a-half weeks ago. Likely improver with strong prospects. THREECORDSANTHETRUTH (4) is a 15-start maiden who finished fourth at her most recent appearance over 796m at this track (Dirt) after she was well back on straightening. Among the chances in what looks a nice race for her. SPY ON JESS (5) was in the firing line on the corner and finished third last start over 796m at this track (Dirt), beaten 4 lengths. Fitter for that run. Has started two times at this course and distance and is yet to miss the placings. Nicely placed to run well again.

race_form.race_comment: BEAU BUSH (8) ran below his best last time finishing fourth (19.79) over 340m at Gunnedah in a Grade 4/5. Form from his last run is proving very strong. Tough to beat if on-song. PAY ROLL (1) is worth forgiving last start after finishing fifth (23.94) from Box 7 at Casino over 411m. Boasts a strong record from this draw with five wins and four minor placings from 11 starts. Has ability and a bold showing is expected. TURBO CASH (2) finished third (19.81) two back at Gunnedah but out of the placings last time when 6th at this track. Better than last start and can bounce back. RADLEY ERSKIN (7) is always hard to beat when drawn in this box. Something for the Multiples: RUBY ON SCOTCH (6)

RADLEY ERSKIN (7) is always hard to beat when drawn in this box. Something for the Multiples: RUBY ON SCOTCH (6)

race_form.race_comment: PAPALOAPAN (12) Came in 5th last start at this track. Giving another chance here. Appears well in this. MARIANKA (6) Racing on a quick back up. Honest race when 2nd last start here and returning to an increased distance. Goes very close. ALROSA (3) Ran 4th last run at the track. Should improve from the last run. A win wouldn't surprise. BELGICA (2) 2yo by Tom's D'etat racing as a debutant for L Ibarra and has a good draw. Keep your eye on the market.

BELGICA (2) 2yo by Tom's D'etat racing as a debutant for L Ibarra and has a good draw. Keep your eye on the market.

race_form.race_comment: SOS DE BOCA (11) was sent out favourite last time and scored by 2 lengths at this track. Yet to miss the frame in two starts over this course and distance. Has the pace to settle in the leading division. Will play a major role. ON THE WAY (8) is on a quick turnaround after a solid second over 1200m at this track seven days ago. Good effort last start and is a definite winning chance. THE KINKA (10) was out of the money two runs back then again missed the frame last start over 1000m at Club Hipico De Santiago, beaten 5 lengths into sixth. Taking on a better field but he is good enough to turn the recent form around. OUR KING (6) finished a fair fifth in a 1900m contest at Club Hipico De Santiago last time out. No surprise to see him in contention.
